name: Dawnfly
movement: walk 20 ft., climb 20 ft., fly 90 ft.
description: The Dawnfly is a gargantuan beast with immense size and powerful physical attacks, featuring striking wings and a strong presence.
memorable: Its ability to create a zone of incapacitation and its immunity to cold and fire damage make it a unique and formidable opponent.
goals: Acts purely on instinct and desire, making it a chaotic force in battle.
relations: May be encountered with other large beasts or as a solitary predator.
environment: Typically found in areas where it can dominate both ground and air, such as mountains or vast plains.
strengths: High Armor Class due to natural armor, significant hit points, and powerful multi-attack capabilities.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence makes it prone to simple tactics and lack of complex strategy.
attacks: Utilizes devastating Multiattack with Bite and Tail strikes, including a powerful Wing Slice that stuns.
most_powerful_ability: The Unsettling Drone incapacitates creatures within 10 feet, adding significant crowd control.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 90 feet, enhancing its ability to navigate and attack despite visual impairments.
skills: Has a passive perception of 12, allowing for basic awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Immunities to cold, fire, and nonmagical damage types.
Ability to double damage to objects and structures as a Siege Monster.
Winged Inferno ignites its wings, dealing area fire damage to nearby creatures.
Can produce a blinding dust to affect creatures in close proximity.
Ability to grapple and drop targets, potentially inflicting fall damage.
test_queries: gargantuan beast that can fly fast
monster that creates a zone of incapacitation
powerful flying creature with flame attacks
large chaotic monster with multiattack capabilities
